description: This table contains generic information related to a patient's inpatient stay, including data on patient education, notes, and other topics.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the inpatient data store record.

columns.name: TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the flowsheet template.

columns.name: TEMPLATE_ID_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name associated with this template.

columns.name: DISCH_INST_HNO_ID
columns.description: The HNO ID of the patient's discharge instructions, for discharge instructions created in version Epic Aug 2021 or prior. In version Epic Nov 2021 and later, the discharge instruction information that was previously stored in INP will now be stored in HNO for Note Type 18-Discharge Instructions, with information about instances where discharge instructions were reviewed, updated, or signed extracted in the Clarity table DISCH_INSTR_HISTORY.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current status of the Inpatient Data record: active or resolved.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Resolved


Deleted

columns.name: EPT_CSN
columns.description: Link to Contact Serial Number in EPT for associated encounter.

columns.name: BRST_STAT_INST_TM
columns.description: Stores the last instant that Breastfeeding Status was saved.

columns.name: PAIN_EDU_INST_TM
columns.description: Stores the last instant the Pain Education was saved.

columns.name: HC_INSTANT_TM
columns.description: Stores the last instant that the Head Circumference was saved.

columns.name: PF_INSTANT_TM
columns.description: Stores the last instant that Peak Flow was saved.

columns.name: EXINGC_INSTANT_TM
columns.description: Stores the last instant that Exclude in Growth Charts information was saved.

columns.name: ALT_PRINT_INST_TM
columns.description: Stores the last instant BestPractice Advisory (BPA) alert information was saved.

columns.name: IP_NOTE_MOD_INST_TM
columns.description: The time the Notes were last modified for this Inpatient Data record.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The date and time this row was last updated (the last time it was extracted or this column was backfilled).
